flavor_text: [i]Where Iroishi meets the Blind Eternities, emotional energy collects into worlds of magic and wonder. Between them, incomprehensible chaos reigns.[/i]
rules_text2:
When this land transforms into The Place Between, search your library for a legendary card or a card named on your signature. Reveal it and put it into your hand, then shuffle.
{T}: Add two mana of any one color.
